languages.text: The Officer encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Офицер воодушевляет союзника, снимая с него эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}. Если на цель действует Приказ командира, она также получает +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Leader encourages an ally to immediately recover from burning, bleeding, toxin, and stunned effects.{br} If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, it gains +2×(Leader's WP bonus) temporary wounds.

The Leader encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from burn, bleed, toxin, and stun effects.{br} If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +(2× Leader's WP bonus) temporary wounds.

The Officer encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

The Leader encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from burn, bleed, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and stun effects.{br} If the target is under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

The Officer encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

languages.text: Офицер воодушевляет союзника, снимая с него эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}. Если на цель действует Приказ командира, она также получает +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Officer encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Лидер воодушевляет союзника, снимая с него эффекты горения, кровотечения, отравления и оглушения.{br} Если на цель действует Приказ командира, она также получает +(2 × бонус ВОЛ лидера) временного здоровья.

Лидер воодушевляет союзника, снимая с него эффекты горения, кровотечения, отравления и оглушения.{br} Если на цель действует Приказ командира, она также получает +(2 × бонус ВОЛ лидера) временного здоровья.

Лидер воодушевляет союзника, снимая с него эффекты горения, кровотечения, отравления и оглушения.{br} Если на цель действует Приказ командира, она также получает +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}鼓励一名盟友，该盟友立即解除{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}效果。 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，该盟友还会额外获得{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 领袖鼓励一名盟友，该盟友立即从燃烧、流血、毒素和眩晕效果中恢复过来。{br} 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，该盟友还会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于（2×领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）。
领袖鼓励一名盟友，该盟友立即从燃烧、流血、毒素和眩晕效果中恢复过来。{br} 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，该盟友还会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030}。

languages.text: El oficial exhorta a un aliado, que se recupera inmediatamente de los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdimiento{/g}. Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, también gana +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Officer encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El oficial exhorta a un aliado, que se recupera inmediatamente de los efectos quemadura, hemorragia, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y aturdimiento.{br} Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, también gana +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

El líder exhorta a un aliado, que se recupera inmediatamente de los efectos quemadura, hemorragia, toxina y aturdimiento.{br} Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, también gana +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

languages.text: Der Offizier ermutigt einen Verbündeten, der sich sofort von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-Effekten erholt. Ist das Ziel mit Stimme des Kommandos belegt, erhält es außerdem +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Officer encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Offizier ermutigt einen Verbündeten, der sich sofort von Verbrennungs-, Blutungs-, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}- und Betäubungseffekten erholt.{br} Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, erhält es außerdem +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

Der Anführer ermutigt einen Verbündeten, der sich sofort von Verbrennungs-, Blutungs-, Gift- und Betäubungseffekten erholt.{br} Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, erhält es außerdem +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: L'officier encourage un allié, qui se rétablit immédiatement des effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}. Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du commandement, elle bénéficie également de +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Officer encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Leader encourage un allié, qui se rétablit immédiatement des effets Brûlure, Saignement, Toxine et Étourdissement.{br} Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement, elle bénéficie également de +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} du Leader) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

Le Leader encourage un allié, qui se rétablit immédiatement des effets Brûlure, Saignement, Toxine et Étourdissement.{br} Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement, elle bénéficie également de +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}は味方を激励し、即座に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}効果を回復する。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、さらに の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}+{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030}を得る。
languages.original_text: The Officer encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: リーダーは味方を激励し、即座に炎上、出血、毒、スタン効果を回復する。{br} ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、さらに(2× リーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
リーダーは味方を激励し、即座に炎上、出血、毒、スタン効果を回復する。{br} ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、さらに{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030}の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Subay; bir dost birimi yüreklendirerek onun üzerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemleme{/g} etkilerini anında ortadan kaldırır. Hedef, Emir Sözü kabiliyetinin etkisi altındaysa aynı zamanda +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: The Officer encourages an ally, who immediately recovers from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they also gain +{uip|TemporaryWounds|083057fc1a6b47f29ea0409337135030} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
